data.eml:eml: Two new species of Mesostrix Mazur, 1994 (Coleoptera: Histeridae) from Southeast Asia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mazur, Sławomir, Mokrzycki, Tomasz (2014): Two new species of Mesostrix Mazur, 1994 (Coleoptera: Histeridae) from Southeast Asia. Zootaxa 3755 (2): 197-200, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3755.2.6
